alert.note: Alert for Edgefield; Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 7:51PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Newberry, north central Edgefield and Saluda Counties through 830 PM EST... At 751 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Saluda County Airport, or 19 miles west of Batesburg-Leesville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saluda, Saluda County Airport, Silverstreet, Saluda Co Sheriff`s Office, Good Hope, Northside Fire Station Main, Wyses Ferry, Hollywood Elementary School, Emory, Scurry Airport, Circle Fire Station, Hickory Grove, Riverbend Boat Ramp, Saluda High School, and Pleasant Lane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
